name: Rozz Williams
birth_place: 美国,加利福尼亚州,波莫纳
introduction: Rozz Williams (born Roger Alan Painter November 6, 1963 – April 1, 1998) was an American vocalist and musician of several varieties, most famous for fronting the bands Christian Death and Shadow Project, the latter with musician Eva O though his main project throughout his career was the industrial, Premature Ejaculation. He is also cited by some as a pioneer of deathrock.Other musical projects he was involved in include Daucus Karota, Heltir, Exp and Premature Ejaculation. Williams also recorded several solo albums.

property_other.label: 流派
property_other.value: Deathrock / 摇滚 / Dark-Cabaret / Gothic / Experimental
